title: Mosaic GT-X Ti gravel bikes get big clearance, w/ custom tubeset & geometry as standard
content:
Mosaic Cycles have introduced two new titanium gravel framesets to their G-Series adventure line-up; the Mosaic GT-1X and GT-2X. Built around proper 29″ x 2.25″ tires and decorated with a multitude of mounts, these frames are undoubtedly an attractive option for bikepackers looking for a lightweight and all-terrain capable ride. The post Mosaic GT-X Ti gravel bikes get big clearance, w/ custom tubeset & geometry as standard appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
